duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to design reviews and provide technical expertise for design for manufacture, test, and assembly.
Develop, introduce, and maintain new planning, production, quality, ERP, data collection and analysis, and other processes.
Collaborate with other machine shops for general alignment, capability, and support.
Responsible for continuous improvement and cost reduction projects belonging to the fabrication department.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mechanical, aerospace, or manufacturing engineering, or equivalent (Master's preferred)
